column4: Hi I'm trying to install my dlink dwa-140 wireless usb. I' following this tutorial  http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1016108. I've downloaded the latest RAlink drivers and am stuck on point 10. make && make install. when i run that command I get the following errors http://pastebin.com/GLm7UZjm
i belive so, give it a whirl...
build-essential i belive is a big meta-package for gcc, g++, libc, dpkg-dev, etc.
